publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4085 Alex Neil: Compensation for Public Sector Housing Relocations—That the Parliament notes that the compensation levels awarded to people in public sector housing who are required to relocate have not been altered since 1973 and calls on the Scottish Executive to review immediately these compensation levels as a matter of urgency.

S2M-4085 Alex Neil: Compensation for Public Sector Housing Relocations—That the Parliament notes that the compensation levels awarded to people in public sector housing who are required to relocate have not been altered since *1991* and calls on the Scottish Executive to review immediately these compensation levels as a matter of urgency. Supported by: Michael Matheson*

S2M-4085 Alex Neil: Compensation for Public Sector Housing Relocations—That the Parliament notes that the compensation levels awarded to people in public sector housing who are required to relocate have not been altered since 1991 and calls on the Scottish Executive to review immediately these compensation levels as a matter of urgency. Supported by: Michael Matheson
S2M-4085 Compensation for Public Sector Housing Relocations (lodged on 8 March 2006) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-4085 Compensation for Public Sector Housing Relocations (lodged on 8 March 2006) Ms Sandra White*
